item.name: overviewcomment
item.description: Inserts a comment at the top of the register.conf file
item.code: COMMENT: ---- REGISTER.CONF file for Chisimba module {MODULENAME} ----

item.name: coreparams
item.description: Place holder for inserting the core parameters in place of {BASIC}

item.name: languageelems
item.description: Place holder for inserting the language elements in place of {LANGUAGEELEMS}
